name: Mine, Robot!
description:
My submission for the RE:Start! PSP 2022 game jam: https://itch.io/jam/psp-2022-game-jam

Play as the mine-disarming robot Isaac who is unfortunately equipped with a glitchy scanner. Disarm as many mines as you can without running out of time or lives!

Source available here: https://bitbucket.org/williamblair/restartpsp2022/src/master/

Written in C++ using PSPDEV/PSPSDK: https://pspdev.github.io/

Asset credits:

https://poly.pizza/m/dhLVA8z7cGo
